name: LOFE Adjustable Memory Foam Pillow's One Layer - 1 Height 1.2'' Insert for Cervical Pillow for Neck Pain Relief, CertiPUR-US Memory Foam Piece for Neck Support Pillow for Stomach Sleeper, Blue, Soft
short_description: TWO DIFFERENT SOFTNESS FOR CHOICE: The blue memory foam layer is soft while the white memory foam layer is medium firm. You can choose the softness of the layers to achieve you ideal support! Buy one only get one layer, not two layers you will get!

GOOD IDEA AS THE PILLOW'S FILLER – Or DIY YOUR OWN PILLOW!: Its size is 23.6x14.2x1.2 inches. The memory foam layer can be used to elevate your pillow if you feel your pillow's height is too low. At the same time, you can purchase multiple layers with your spare pillowcase to customize your pillow. We recommend two layers for stomach sleeping and 3-4 layers for side and back sleeping.

INNER PILLOWCASE FOR LONGER SERVICE LIFE: Each layer of memory foam is equipped with an inner pillowcase, which can protect the memory foam from being torn. It also prevents memory foam from yellowing.

EXPLANATION OF MEMORY FOAM'S ODOR: When you open the package, the pillow may still have a "foamy " smell because we packaged it quickly after producing. Our memory foam is certified by CertiPUR-US. Using the pillow directly is not harmful. If you really mind it, You can take the pillow core out of the pillowcase and let it air out for 2 days or wash the pillowcase. This smell will fade away.

LOFE - LOVE LIFE, LOVE SLEEP: The brand LOFE is originated from the meaning of LOVE LIFE. Bring LOFE(LOVE LOFE) contour pillows to home, let you LOVE SLEEP . We are a small company specializing in the development of pillows, such as buchwheat pillow, kid pillow, contour pillow and so on. Our factory has been producing a number of pillows for more than 20 years. We always start with what our customers want and find a way to meet their needs. We try our best to develop contour pillow through 1000+ tests. If any issues with your LOFE contour pillow, our friendly customer service team is always ready to help. It is our priority for your satisfaction!

name: Sleep Doctor Approved Cervical Neck Pillow for Sleeping, Ergonomic Contour Side Sleeper Pillows for Adults, Cooling Orthopedic Pillow for Pain Relief Support, Memory Foam Pillows Back Stomach Sleepers
short_description: NIGHTLY RELIEF, MORNING REFRESH! Revolutionize your sleep with Emircey versatile sleep neck pillow. Engineered with an innovative design featuring a unique hollow and butterfly-patented contour, Emircey ergonomic pillow revolutionizes your sleep by mimicking the human anatomy. This contour molds airtight to your head's shape, naturally aligning your entire body spine and reducing cervical stress to the maximum. And it also offers ample space for your shoulders without feeling cramped or constricted. With an extended armrest area, you can position your hands freely. Your gateway to a painless slumber awaits – transform your nights!

ONE PILLOW, ALL POSITIONS! With so many memory foam pillows made specifically for side sleepers, back sleepers, and more, how can the Emircey cervical pillow be just right for everyone? It comes down to our perfect orthopedic pillow "recipe" based on over 50 years of experience and helping millions find their ideal fit. Simply flip your contour pillow 180 degrees for varied contour heights (3.5'' & 3.1''). The high profile is best for larger body frames and side sleepers, while the low profile is optimal for front, back, and other sleeper types. Plus, it's incredibly sculptable, making it easy to shape and adjust right under your head and neck for the best support in any position!

OMIGOSH! HOT SLEEPERS REJOICE! Waking up covered in sweat? Fear not! All of that is gone with the EmirceyPillow 2.0s cooling technology. Our outer cover's fibers have a temperature-neutral touch that is never too cool or too warm. It is treated with our plant-based Move+Cool treatment that maximizes the cover's natural wicking, heat dissipation and evaporation qualities. With a 95% permeable cell rate in the memory foam inner fill, our memory foam pillow enables twice the airflow of conventional foam fills. Emircey cervical neck pillow is much MORE than a cooling pillow—it's a complete thermal regulation system inside and out, designed for unmatched comfort. Just right, all night.

SUSTAINABLY MADE PILLOWS YOU'LL LOVE! For us, while making the best pillow for neck pain was a key goal, minimizing our impact on the environment was not negotiable. From day one, Emircey neck support pillow had to be a sustainable choice. Our Omigosh-soft outer cover is crafted from BioPreferred polyester fiber, sourced sustainably from renewable wood pulp. Our memory foam is a CertiPUR-US Certified Biobased Product and the memory foam components can be recycled after use, further reducing environmental impact. While some side-sleeper pillows are made from off-gassing materials and VOCs, the Emircey neck pain pillow is a safe, green, sustainable choice.

HASSLE-FREE PURCHASE EXPERIENCE! If you have any inquiries about our neck pillows for pain relief sleeping, please feel free to contact our customer service. How much difference can a great neck support pillow make? The right memory foam neck pillow can relieve neck pain, improve overall sleep quality and encourage you to spend more time in bed. It's a good gift for dad, mom, fathers, mothers, girlfriends, boyfriends, husbands, wife & colleagues, birthdays Christmas gifts. Being pain-free is truly priceless. Buy Emircey side sleeper pillows for adults, Experience the bliss of pain-free sleeping!

Please note: Since pillow support varies from person to person, allow time for your body to adjust and experience truly comfortable, supportive sleep. Standard size: 21.26*14.17*5.51 inches. Please allow for a slight difference of 0.5 to 1 inch due to manual measurement.Recommended for Sleepers: Suitable for users with a head-to-neck base length of ≤10.75 inches and shoulder width of ≤21.6 inches. Note: Manual measurements may have a margin of error of ±2 inches.

The cooling side is made of cool ice silky fabric, which can reduce temperature about 4 to 9°F. The soft side is made of breathable rayon to offer exceptional softness.

Machine Washable Cover: The zippered pillowcase is removable, machine-washable, and dries quickly. Adopt smoother zipper and an anti-snag design, making it easier to adjust the filling.

name: DreamyBlue Signature Pillow w/Adjustable Loft • Shredded Memory Foam Fill • Neutral Alignment for Side, Back, and Stomach Sleepers • Washable Bamboo Rayon Cover • CertiPUR-US Certified Foam (Queen)
short_description: 𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗘𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗖𝗘 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗧 𝗢𝗙 𝗛𝗘𝗔𝗟𝗧𝗛𝗬 𝗔𝗟𝗜𝗚𝗡𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧 – Have you tried every, down, feather, and memory foam pillow out there? DreamyBlue’s Signature pillow combines innovative fill, patented design, and adjustable loft that enable your body’s natural alignment and neutral posture all night long.

𝗙𝗜𝗡𝗔𝗟𝗟𝗬! 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗜𝗗𝗘𝗔𝗟 𝗠𝗜𝗫 𝗢𝗙 𝗠𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗥𝗬 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗠𝗢𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 – Feather and down provide motion, but they don’t mold to your body. Standard memory foam has the opposite issue. 𝗔𝗗𝗝𝗨𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗔𝗟𝗟 𝗦𝗟𝗘𝗘𝗣𝗘𝗥𝗦, 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗔𝗟𝗟 𝗟𝗜𝗙𝗘 𝗟𝗢𝗡𝗚 – You may be chasing better rest or recovering from stress or injury. You might suffer from snoring, discomfort, or a stiff neck in the morning. At every age and life stage, our alignment-focused, adjustable pillow puts full control in your hands. Simply open the easy-access zipper to add to or remove from the total fill.

𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗘𝗥𝗢𝗨𝗦 𝗦𝗨𝗣𝗣𝗟𝗬 𝗢𝗙 𝗕𝗢𝗡𝗨𝗦 𝗣𝗜𝗟𝗟𝗢𝗪 𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗟 𝗜𝗡𝗖𝗟𝗨𝗗𝗘𝗗 – We know our stuff, but you know you! That’s why you get a FREE extra bag of fill with every purchase. Whether you’re a side sleeper needing lots of fill, a stomach sleeper needing just a bit, or a back sleeper needing a happy medium, your DreamyBlue pillow is 30 seconds away from being goldilocks perfect.

𝗦𝗢𝗙𝗧, 𝗕𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗛𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘, 𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗣𝗨𝗥-𝗨𝗦 𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗 𝗙𝗢𝗔𝗠 – As a premium brand, we care about every single component of your pillow. Featuring a patented design, it’s wrapped in a breathable, bamboo-extracted rayon pillowcase.

name: Royal Therapy Memory Foam Pillow, Queen Neck Pain Relief, Contour Cervical Pillow, for Neck and Shoulder Pain, Side, Back and Stomach Sleeper
short_description: Behind every great night’s sleep is our cervical neck pillow with an ideal shape, height, and density. This medium firmness contour neck pillow provides just that, offering you a perfect balance of orthopedic support and plushness.

Royal Therapy side and back sleeper pillows don't only provide support and comfort, but they also make your night's sleep something you look forward to. We took a new approach to create our ergonomic pillow. Unlike traditional contour pillow for side sleepers, our special foam is engineered to make a more ventilated, adjustable cervical pillow.

Our memory foam cervical pillow is designed to relieve neck and shoulder pain by providing the correct sleeping posture. Made to cradle your natural curve, our neck contour pillow comes with an adjustable loft that accommodates different shoulder widths.

The unique 3-layer design allows you to adjust the memory foam contour pillow for optimal orthopedic support so you can sleep comfortably all night. Simply remove the middle layer of memory foam to customize your comfort level. Your body will be molded to the back and side sleeper cervical pillow for a complete ergonomic sleep.

Made from a CertiPUR US memory foam pillow for neck pain works with your body’s temperature to provide the highest quality sleep. Thick enough for personal comfort zones, yet slim enough to encourage sound sleep and spinal alignment throughout the night.
Our premium back and neck pillow memory foam is covered with an original luxurious soft OEKO-TEX washable rayon made from bamboo cover to wick away moisture, keeping you comfortable all night long.

name: Ultra Pain Relief Cooling Pillow for Neck Support, Adjustable Cervical Pillow Cozy Sleeping, Odorless Ergonomic Contour Memory Foam Pillows, Orthopedic Bed Pillow for Side Back Stomach Sleeper
short_description: REVOLUTIONIZE YOUR SLEEP WITH THE INNOVATIVE HOLLOW CONCAVE DESIGN - Tired of waking up with neck pain and discomfort? Look no further! By combining the benefits of a traditional bed pillow and a contour pillow, Our ergonomic hollow contour pillow is here to transform your sleep experience. The hollow concave surface, tilted at a 15-degree angle, skillfully cradles your head, while maintaining the natural curve of your neck and aligning your spine flawlessly. Wake up feeling refreshed!

EXPERIENCE UNINTERRUPTED, BLISSFUL SLEEP WITH OUR VERSATILE PILLOW - Engineered with meticulous precision, this innovative neck pillow features six unique contour zones specifically designed to embrace the natural curvature of your body. Each contour zone works harmoniously to address targeted pressure points, it provides full support to your neck, shoulders, and arms, effectively alleviating your neck pain and muscle stiffness. No longer will you have to compromise on the quality of your rest.

EMBRACE HEALTHY SLEEP WITH PREMIUM MEMORY FOAM & COOLING PILLOWCASE - Unlike 90% of support pillows, Cozyplayer utilizes the Q-Max 0.4 Arc-Chill cooling pillowcase, which instantly reduces skin temperature by 5℃! Additionally, the pillowcase fabric utilizes a highly dense 3D mesh design, offering excellent breathability. Our pillow core is made of 98% breathable memory foam, which is non-toxic, odorless, and certified by OEKO-TEX, CertiPUR-US, and ISPA. Sleep soundly and stay dry all night!

CUSTOMIZABLE SLEEP HEIGHT! EXPERIENCE TRUE LIBERATION! According to the latest research, maintaining a 15° golden ratio of ARC neck traction during sleep is pivotal in restoring the body's natural curves and enhancing deep sleep by an astounding 45 minutes! Cozyplayer offers enhanced freedom in this regard, allowing you to achieve greater contouring by rotating the cooling pillow 180 degrees or removing the bottom insert. You'll always find the perfect sleep height on our bed pillow!

NO-WORRY AFTER-SALE SUPPORT, YOUR SATISFACTION GUARANTEED! - we are dedicated to delivering top-notch products that enhance your shopping journey. To exemplify our commitment, we proudly offer you a risk-free 100-night trial period for this remarkable contour pillow. Moreover, it doubles as an excellent gift for your parents, friends, long-term usage will greatly improve the quality of sleep.
